name: Pasta Macedonia
keywords: calamata olives, feta, parmesan, pasta, sour cream, spinach, main course, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 small onions or 1 large, coarsely chopped
1 pound mezzania, thin tubular pasta, cooked and drained
12 ripe calamata olives, pitted and sliced
1/2 cup finely grated Pardo or Parmesan cheese
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Sautee the onions over medium heat until translucent.
Mix together the pasta, sour cream, onion, feta, olives and 1/2 cup cheese. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Place in serving bowl.
Top with spinach and additional cheese.
